item.title: Security Tools
item.description: Tools I have experience with but not limited to: Microsoft: Azure, o365, Exchange Admin, Purview, Defender for Cloud App. Trend Micro Suite: Vision one, Tipping Point IPS, Deep Discovery suite, Email Security, Apex One, Cloud App. CyberArk: privilege Access Manager (PAM), Vendor remote access (Alero), Endpoint privilege Manager (EPM). Git Wireshark Zscaler BurpSuite SIEM: IBM Qradar, Forescout Cysiv vulnerability assessment & Threat intelligence: Rapid 7 IVM, Intsights Threat command OS: MacOS, Windows, Linux

item.title: Resume
item.description: Resume Mohammed Abdulkadir! Background I am an experienced Security specialist, with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and a Master’s degree in Cybersecurity. My work involves architecture, implementing and testing new security tools features, proactive monitoring for malicious activity, detection and incident response including insider threats. I have some experience with web development and using web technologies to upgrade or build websites for small businesses. As someone born in Nigeria, I have developed strong cultural fluency living and working in Canada, the United States, and beyond.
